mapper.select: select t.module_code "id", t.module_name "name" from dw_newquery_module_type t order by to_number(t.ord)
select roleid from tfw_user where id=#{userId}

select menuid from TFW_RELATION where roleid in
#{role}
select ROLEIN "rolein",ROLEOUT "roleout" from TFW_ROLE_EXT where id=#{userId}
select t.label_code "tabId", t.label_name "tabName" from dw_newquery_switch_label t where module_type = #{markType} order by ord
select t.module_code "id", t.module_name "name" from dw_newquery_module_type t order by to_number(t.ord)
select t.url "url" from dw_newquery_module_type t where t.module_code = #{typeId}
mapper.sql: union all select '111' prov_id, '全国' pro_name，area_id, area_desc,-3 pro_ord ,a.ord area_ord from dmcode_pub.dmcode_area a where is_valid = '1' and area_id != '999'

union all select '112' prov_id, '北十省' pro_name, a.area_id, a.area_desc, -2 pro_ord , a.ord area_ord from dmcode_pub.dmcode_province p left join dmcode_pub.dmcode_area a on p.prov_id = a.prov_id where a.is_valid = '1' and p.s_n_mark = '10' and a.area_id != '999'

union all select '113' prov_id, '南二十一省' pro_name, a.area_id, a.area_desc, -1 pro_ord , a.ord area_ord from dmcode_pub.dmcode_province p left join dmcode_pub.dmcode_area a on p.prov_id = a.prov_id where a.is_valid = '1' and p.s_n_mark = '21' and a.area_id != '999'
mapper.select:
select prov_id, pro_name, area_id, area_desc from (
select p.prov_id, p.pro_name, a.area_id, a.area_desc, to_number(p.ord2) pro_ord ,a.ord area_ord from dmcode_pub.dmcode_province p left join dmcode_pub.dmcode_area a on p.prov_id = a.prov_id where a.is_valid = '1' and p.s_n_mark is not null and a.area_id != '999'
select p.prov_id, p.pro_name, a.area_id, a.area_desc, to_number(p.ord2) pro_ord ,a.ord area_ord from dmcode_pub.dmcode_province p left join dmcode_pub.dmcode_area a on p.prov_id = a.prov_id where a.is_valid = '1' and p.s_n_mark='10' and a.area_id != '999'
select p.prov_id, p.pro_name, a.area_id, a.area_desc, to_number(p.ord2) pro_ord ,a.ord area_ord from dmcode_pub.dmcode_province p left join dmcode_pub.dmcode_area a on p.prov_id = a.prov_id where a.is_valid = '1' and p.s_n_mark ='21' and a.area_id != '999'
select p.prov_id, p.pro_name, a.area_id, a.area_desc, to_number(p.ord2) pro_ord ,a.ord area_ord from dmcode_pub.dmcode_province p left join dmcode_pub.dmcode_area a on p.prov_id = a.prov_id where a.is_valid = '1' and p.prov_id=#{provId} and a.area_id != '999'
) order by to_number(pro_ord) asc, to_number(area_ord) asc
select distinct to_char(to_date(max(d.MAX_DATE), 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') "date" from ${table} d where label_type = 'D'
select distinct to_char(to_date(max(d.MAX_DATE), 'yyyymm'), 'yyyy-mm') "date" from ${table} d where label_type = 'M'
select pro_name "name" from v_dw_newquery_DMCODE_PROVINCE p where prov_id = #{provId}

select report_table_code "id", icon "icon", url "url" from V_DW_NEWQUERY_REPORT_TABLE where report_table_code in
#{statementId}
select sys_code,code_value from system_variables where sys_code in('code_1001','code_1002')

select t.dimension_type_code tid,n.dimension_code id,t.dimension_type_name tname ,n.channel_type_name text from dw_dimension_type t,dw_dimension_name n where t.dimension_type_code=n.dimension_type_code order by to_number(n.ord)
select t.title_name from DW_MONTH_REPORT_TITLE t order by rownum

select l.level_code id,l.parent_code pid,l.space, nvl2(k.uatio,k.uatio,1)uatio,k.format,k.unit,k.region_drill, k.user_drill,k.channel_drill,k.contract_drill, decode(k.kpi_code, null, '', k.kpi_code) kpiCode, decode(l.level_name, null, k.kpi_name, l.level_name) title from dw_kpi_level l left join dw_kpi k on l.level_code = k.level_code and l.type=k.type where l.type = '1' order by l.ord

select pro.id,pro.title,c.* from (
select p.prov_id id,p.pro_name title,p.ord2 from v_dmcode_province_31 p
select p.prov_id id,p.pro_name title,p.ord2 from dmcode_pub.dmcode_province p where 1=1
and p.s_n_mark='10'
and p.s_n_mark='21'
and p.prov_id = #{prov}
)pro, ( select * from ( select l.parent_code pid, nvl2(k.uatio,k.uatio,1)uatio, k.format,k.unit, to_char(to_number(l.space)+2) space, decode(k.kpi_code,null,'',k.kpi_code) kpiCode from dw_kpi_level l left join dw_kpi k on l.level_code=k.level_code where l.type='1') code where 1 = 1
AND code.kpiCode = #{kid} )c order by to_number(ord2)

select decode(k.kpi_code,null,'',k.kpi_code) kid from (select * from dw_kpi_level l where 1=1 and l.parent_code !='-1' order by l.ord ) le left join dw_kpi k on le.level_code=k.level_code where 1=1 and le.type='1' and rownum=1
